div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1536 Latakia (anc. Laodiceia ad Mare), Seleucis, 1946 Burial: c. 198 B.C. Contents: 34+ AR Alexander III: 17 late post. tetradr. (Odes- sus 1, Chios 3, Miletus 1, Rhodes 6, Phaselis 1 of yr. 10, Aradus 5 to yr. 61) Antigonus Doson: 2 tetradr. Alabanda: 1 tetradr. Side: 6 tetradr. Seleucus I: 1 tetradr. (Seleuceia ad Tigrim) Seleucus II: 1 tetradr. (Apameia as WSM 1150) Antiochus III: 6 tetradr. (Nisibis 4 as ESM 396, Ecbatana 2 as ESM 608) Disposition: dispersed Seyrig, RN 1963, pp. 42, 62; Tr√©sors du Levant (in press)
